title: Definitions
context: PART II. DEBT AFFORDABILITY STUDY [ยง37C-11] Definitions. For the purpose of this part: &ldquo;Ensuing twenty-five fiscal year period&rdquo; means the twenty-five fiscal years following the submittal of a multi-year program and financial plan to the legislature. &ldquo;Fiscal years covered by the applicable multi-year program and financial plan&rdquo; means the six fiscal years following the submittal of the multi-year program and financial plan to the legislature. [L 2015, c 149, pt of ยง2]
